text: Virág Balla (born 26 June 1994) is a Hungarian sprint canoeist. She participated at the 2018 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships, winning a medal.C-2 500 m results ==References== Category:Living people Category:1994 births Category:Hungarian female canoeists Category:ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships medalists in Canadian Category:Sportspeople from Győr Category:European Games competitors for Hungary Category:Canoeists at the 2019 European Games Category:European Games medalists in canoeing Category:European Games gold medalists for Hungary
title: Virág Balla
